title: Motor vehicle insurance
context: [ยง346-17.3] Motor vehicle insurance. The parents of a child under foster care who has obtained a driver&rsquo;s license shall pay the costs of the child&rsquo;s motor vehicle insurance, unless the court determines the parents to be financially unable to pay the costs, in which case the child&rsquo;s insurance costs shall be paid pursuant to sections 431:10C-407 and 431:10C-410. [L 2010, c 135, pt of ยง2]
